</br>

A virtual workshop for R coders to learn about version control tools starting from the very basics. R-Ladies+ aims to support all underrepresented genders of R Coders, including but not limited to cis/trans women, trans men, non-binary, genderqueer, and agender individuals.

[Click here to view the workshop materials](https://grcetmpk.github.io/rladies-quartowebpages/)
